from django.contrib import admin
from django.urls import path
from example_app.views import ConvertCurrencyView, ExchangeRateTrendsView

urlpatterns = [
    path('admin/', admin.site.urls),
    path('', ConvertCurrencyView.as_view(), name='home'),
    path('trends/', ExchangeRateTrendsView.as_view(), name='exchange_rate_trends'),
]
